stories.name: Generate Command Definitions

WHEN all commands are defined, THEN generator outputs command definition file

WHEN script is generated, THEN it launches repl_main.py for the specific bot
WHEN REPL is launched, THEN it includes TTY detection, state display, command parsing, and execution

stories.name: Generate Cursor Commands
acceptance_criteria: WHEN generator creates CursorReplVisitor, THEN it follows existing visitor pattern
WHEN visitor generates shortcuts, THEN it creates navigate shortcuts for behaviors
WHEN visitor generates action shortcuts, THEN it creates shortcuts for behavior-action combinations
WHEN visitor generates help shortcuts, THEN it creates help and status commands

stories.name: Generate Help Documentation
acceptance_criteria: WHEN generator creates HelpReplVisitor, THEN it generates command reference with all REPL commands
WHEN help is generated, THEN it includes parameter reference with descriptions for all action parameters
WHEN examples are generated, THEN it includes scope examples with dot-notation syntax
WHEN documentation is output, THEN it creates Markdown help files in .cursor/commands/ and terminal help

Given Bot has behavior shape and workflow state shows current_action=strategy

Given Current behavior is discovery, requested behavior is shape

Then Executes directly without order checking

scenarios.name: Behavior action order determines next action from current action
scenarios.steps:
Given behavior_action_state.json shows current_action: build
And completed_actions: [clarify] (may be behind)
When bot loads state
Then current action is build (uses current_action from file as source of truth)

scenarios.name: Behavior action order starts at first action when no completed actions
scenarios.steps:
Given bot loads state with no completed_actions
When bot is created
Then current action is the first action (clarify)

scenarios.name: Behavior action order uses current action when provided
scenarios.steps:
Given current_action: strategy
And completed_actions: [clarify]
When bot loads state
Then current action is strategy (uses current_action from file)

scenarios.name: Behavior action order falls back to completed actions when current action missing
scenarios.steps:
Given bot has completed actions: [clarify, strategy, build]
And current_action is empty in state file
When bot is created
Then current action falls back to validate (next after last completed)

scenarios.name: Behavior action order starts at first action when no state file exists
scenarios.steps:
Given no state file exists
When bot is created
Then bot starts at first action (clarify)

scenarios.name: Behavior action order out of order navigation removes completed actions after target
scenarios.steps:
Given current_action: validate

When navigate out of order back to build
Then current action is build
And render is removed from completed_actions

WHEN: bot.execute_behavior('code', action='validate') is called

WHEN file scope uses glob patterns, THEN patterns are evaluated correctly
WHEN file scope includes exclude patterns, THEN excluded files are skipped

acceptance_criteria: WHEN bot.scope.set() is called with file scope while story scope active, THEN story scope is replaced
WHEN bot.scope.set() is called with story scope while file scope active, THEN file scope is replaced
WHEN bot.scope.get() is called, THEN only one scope type is returned

stories.name: Clear Scope Through Bot API

scenarios.name: Clear scope removes all filters

stories.name: proactively Validate knowledge against rules
acceptance_criteria:
WHEN BuildKnowledgeAction it's the initial pass of building the knowledge graphTHEN Build Knowledge Action invokes the Validate Rules action to understand if what is generated violates any rules
(see Validate Knowledge & Content Against Rules)

WHEN Validate Rules action is finsihed generateing the validation report THEN the BuildKnowledgeAction goes through all of the violations to determine if any corrective action needs to be taken AND the system updates the knowledge graph based on the recommendations.

WHEN BuildKnowledgeAction Is finished making corrections.
THEN BuildKnowledgeAction tells AI to notify the user of what corrections it made as part of presenting the fact that it's done building knowledge.

scenarios.name: Build knowledge forwards to validate action bot and receives enhanced instructions

Given Agent is initialized with agent_name='test_story_bot'

And Knowledge graph exists at 'agile_bot/bots/test_story_bot/docs/stories/story-graph.json'
And Behavior has validation rules '{validation_rules}'
And Validation rules have code scanners '{code_scanners}'
And Code scanners are stubbed to return '{code_scanner_output}'
When Build knowledge action forwards to validate_action_bot with knowledge graph at 'agile_bot/bots/test_story_bot/docs/stories/story-graph.json'
Then Validate action bot runs stubbed code scanners '{code_scanners}' against knowledge graph
And Stubbed scanners return '{code_scanner_output}'
And Validation report is generated with '{code_scanner_output}'
And Enhanced instructions are returned to build_knowledge action
And Enhanced instructions contain '{enhanced_instructions}'
